description: Germany and Greece record their highest daily cases, while Spain and France reach a "tipping point".
title: Coronavirus in Europe: Infections surge in France, Germany and Spain
title_page: Coronavirus in Europe: Infections surge in France, Germany and Spain - BBC News
maintext: "We are right at a point where things can get better or worse. This means we have to pull out all the stops to curb outbreaks before they become more serious," he said.
